title: Replace app icon and in-app logo with newly provided image

requirements.text: Create new square, cleanly-cropped branding images from the user-uploaded logo photos (IMG_20260208_024007233-8.jpg, IMG_20260208_024007233-9.jpg, IMG_20260208_024007233-10.jpg, IMG_20260208_024007233-11.jpg) and add them as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated. The crop should center the circular school emblem, remove surrounding phone/background borders, and ensure the emblem is fully visible with a small safe padding for maskable icon use.

quotes: Replace these app icon to that one i provided

acceptanceCriteria: New PNG assets exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
The generated icon versions are square, centered, and not visibly skewed; no black phone border/background is included.
The 192x192 and 512x512 icon variants include enough padding to look good as a maskable icon (no important details clipped by rounded masks).

requirements.text: Update the PWA/browser icon metadata to use the newly generated app icon assets by updating references in frontend/index.html and frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest (replace current references to /assets/generated/pkm-app-icon-2026-v4.dim_192x192.png and /assets/generated/pkm-app-icon-2026-v4.dim_512x512.png).

quotes: Replace these app icon to that one i provided

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html <link rel='icon'>, shortcut icon, and apple-touch-icon point to the new icon asset filenames.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest icons[].src entries point to the new icon asset filenames and keep appropriate sizes/type/purpose.
After build, browser tab favicon and installed PWA icon use the new icon images (not the old v4 assets).

requirements.text: Replace the two selected in-app logo image elements with the newly provided logo by updating the centralized branding logoPath (frontend/src/constants/branding.ts) so that the Header logo image (/html/body/div/div/header/div/div/img[1]) and the Home hero logo image (/html/body/div/div/main/div/div/div[2]/div/img[1]) render the updated logo asset via BRANDING.logoPath.

quotes: Replace these app icon to that one i provided

acceptanceCriteria: BRANDING.logoPath is updated to the new logo asset filename.
The Header logo and the Home hero logo display the new logo without layout breakage (maintain object-contain behavior).
No other non-selected images/icons are changed as part of this request.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources).
Backend is out of scope; do not change backend/main.mo or add new canisters/services.
Apply UI replacement only to the two selected elements (Header logo and Home hero logo) via the shared BRANDING.logoPath configuration.
nonGoals: Changing bottom navigation icons or any other UI icons besides the two selected logo elements.
Changing app name, theme colors, or typography.
Adding new authentication methods or any backend feature work.

required: Cleanly cropped square school logo on transparent or clean white background (pkm-school-logo-2026-v3.dim_512x512.png)
Maskable-style square app icon with centered emblem and safe padding (pkm-app-icon-2026-v5.dim_512x512.png)
Small square app icon with centered emblem and safe padding (pkm-app-icon-2026-v5.dim_192x192.png)
